all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, gird up your loins and be prepared. Behold, the kingdom is yours, and the enemy shall not overcome.
Doctrine and Covenants 38:9
Quote of the Day
"The Book of Mormon looks to the future and contains important principles, warnings, and lessons intended for me and you."
David A. Bednar | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
